extendedInfo.description: This is a casual game. What you need to do is to control the sexy beertender.The object of the game is to deliver drinks to your customers before they reach you at the end of the bar, although some customers require refills and will toss their empty mug at you and you must catch it before it hits the floor.Don't make you customers wait too long. Ready? Go!How to play and features  Simple and beautiful interface, simple to play  Use the game music or listen to your mobile phonewhile playing.
